member.name: MIB_OPAQUE_QUERY
member.summary: TheMIB_OPAQUE_QUERY structure contains information for a MIB opaque query.

member.name: MIB_OPAQUE_QUERY.dwVarId
member.summary: The identifier of the MIB object to query.

member.name: MIB_OPAQUE_QUERY.rgdwVarIndex
member.summary: The index of the MIB object to query.
